Reviews.Title: hp photoSmart
Reviews.Author: vidda lute
Reviews.Content: It arrived in time. The camera works. I have everything else to go with it, like the cords. The price was good

Reviews.Title: great camera for price
Reviews.Author: tom waldron
Reviews.Content: works fine, can't beat the price, great for basic photo's- eats batteries if you leave it on for long, would buy again

Reviews.Title: Biggest Waste of Money EVER!
Reviews.Author: jalapeno
Reviews.Content: This camera was made in 2003 so when you try to attach it via USB to any computer it isn't recognized because the software is so out of date. I promptly threw it in the trash and accepted that I threw away 10 dollars.
